mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, background_picture = #{backgroundPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, user_name, email, pass_word, background_picture, create_time, modify_time, introduction from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, user_name, email, pass_word, background_picture, create_time, modify_time, introduction from user
